title: New: Orca Orca & QUALMS – When The Sun Comes Up / Ghost Bones
content:
Split releases can be rather self-indulgent at times, especially when acts simply stick a couple of previously heard tracks onto a vinyl alongside efforts from one of their friends.

Luckily, with this new release from Orca Orca & QUALMS, that’s certainly not the case. Having ‘introduced’ Orca Orca a couple of months back, it’s great to hear some new material from Jim Hewitt, in the form of the angelic When The Sun Comes Up.

Production wise, it’s lo-fi at it’s purest, almost like a more pop-orientated Wavves, with the an extra guitar section from QUALMS adding another dimension to the track. On the flip side, Ghost Bones is a more electronically induced affair, but maintaining the underlying pop tendencies. Check out both tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
